column1: Balanagar mandal is one of the  mandal in Medchal-Malkajgiri district in the Indian state of Telangana. It is under the administration of Malkajgiri revenue division with its headquarters at Balanagar. The mandal is bounded by Quthbullapur
Balanagar mandal is shared by two assembly constituencies namely
column2: Kukatpally and Serilingampally. Kukatpally constituency is in turn is under Malkajgiri

column1: Balanagar mandal do not have any villages and the whole mandal is an urban area and a part of GHMC.
